name: The Art of Back Drivery
description:
The Art of Back Drivery

You've done something bad and the cops are after you!  Too bad that flag fell on your windshield.  Guess you've got to put it in reverse!

Instructions:
WASD to drive
Esc to pause 

This is the entry for our first game jam!
The theme was 'reverse' and the special object was 'flag'.
We had a lot of fun working on this project together and we hope you enjoy playing our little game!

Credits:
Gillian Flynn 
Wade Cormie
Max Maier (@dumamax)
Will Hurd (@heardbyhurd)
Graycee Bolz
